LanguageData.Harvester.label: harvester
LanguageData.Harvester.description: This type of burst laser emplacements are called "Harvesters". As can be inferred from it's name this heavy weapon turret can mow entire enemy groups down in no time.
LanguageData.Harvester_Blueprint.label: harvester (blueprint)
LanguageData.Harvester_Frame.label: harvester (building)
LanguageData.Harmonizer.label: plasma bombard
LanguageData.Harmonizer.description: Heavy plasma bombard. Slow but powerful.

LanguageData.Harmonizer_Frame.label: plasma bombard (building)
